name: Divine Call
description: Divine Shield's cooldown is reduced by 5 sec when you take damage. This effect can only trigger once every <dynamic>30 - 15</dynamic> sec.

name: Shielding Words
description: Word of Glory applies absorb shield that lasts 10 sec for <dynamic>15 - 30</dynamic>% healing on the Paladin when used.

name: Golden Path
description: Consecration heals you for <dynamic>50 - 100</dynamic>% of Consecration's damage every sec while standing within it.

name: Stalwart as a Crusader
description: Crusader Aura reduces all allies' Fear duration by <dynamic>30 - 60</dynamic>%.

name: Light's Barding
description: Divine Steed's duration is increased by <dynamic>50 - 100</dynamic>%.

name: Wrench Evil
description: Turn Evil's cast time is reduced by <dynamic>50 - 100</dynamic>% and its range is increased by 10 yds.

name: Echoing Blessings
description: After it ends, Blessing of Freedom increases the target's movement speed by <dynamic>15 - 30</dynamic>% for 8 sec. After Blessing of Protection or Blessing of Sacrifice ends, the target takes <dynamic>15</dynamic>% less damage for 8 sec.

name: Light's Reach
description: Blade of Justice's range is increased by 2 yds and deals <dynamic>20 - 50</dynamic>% more damage.

name: Truth's Wake
description: Wake of Ashes burns the target for an additional <dynamic>10 - 25</dynamic>% damage over 6 sec.

name: Virtuous Command
description: Judgment grants you Seal of Command for 4 sec, granting your Templar's Verdict, Crusader Strike, Blade of Justice, and weapon attack a 20% chance of dealing <dynamic>10 - 25</dynamic>% additional Holy damage.

name: Templar's Vindication
description: Templar's Verdict has a <dynamic>10 - 20</dynamic>% chance to strike again for 6% of its damage.

name: Enkindled Spirit
description: Aura Master's cooldown is reduced by <dynamic>30.0 sec - 60 sec</dynamic>.

name: Resplendent Light
description: Holy Light heals up to 5 targets within 5 yds for <dynamic>5 - 5</dynamic>% of its healing.

name: Focused Light
description: Holy Shock's chance to critically strike is increased by <dynamic>15 - 15</dynamic>%.

name: Untempered Dedication
description: Light of the Martyr's damage and healing is increased by <dynamic>15 - 15</dynamic>% each time it is cast. This effect can stack up to 5 times and lasts for 15 sec.

name: Vengeful Shock
description: Avenger's Shield causes your target to take <dynamic>15 - 45</dynamic>% more Holy damage for 5 sec.

name: Punish the Guilty
description: Shield of the Righteous deals <dynamic>100 - 100</dynamic>% more damage to targets affected by Judgment.

name: Resolute Defender
description: Shield of the Righteous extends Ardent Defender's duration by <dynamic>25 - 25</dynamic>%.

name: Royal Decree
description: Guardian of Ancient Kings's cooldown is reduced by <dynamic>5 - 10</dynamic> sec, and casting it causes your next Word of Glory to cost no Holy Power.

name: Prolonged Autumn
description: Blessing of Autumn lasts <dynamic>30 - 60</dynamic>% longer.

name: Righteous Might
description: Vanquisher's Hammer deals <dynamic>100 - 100</dynamic>% more damage and heals you for the damage done.

name: Hallowed Discernment
description: Ashen Hallow strikes the lowest health ally and enemy within it for <dynamic>20 - 50</dynamic>% of its effect.

name: Ringing Clarity
description: Kyrian Toll has a <dynamic>30 - 30</dynamic>% chance to cast twice on any given target.
